name: KTS
description: Knowledge Transformation System, JavaScript implementation (this parent not for NPM distribution)

scripts.publish-npms: for d in kxfm-* ; do cd $d ; npm publish --access public ; cd -; done
scripts.publish-visco: cd kxfm-visco ; npm publish --access public ; cd -
scripts.create-links: for d in kxfm-* ; do cd $d ; npm     link ; cd -; done
scripts.consume-links: for d in kxfm-* ; do cd $d ; npm run link ; cd -; done
